organization.name: british-council
organization.title: British Council
organization.description:
The British Council is the UK’s international organisation for cultural relations and educational opportunities, building lasting relationships between the UK and other countries. It is an essential part of our international effort to promote British values and interests.

British Council is an executive non-departmental public body of the Foreign & Commonwealth Office

http://www.britishcouncil.org
